original: 《拾遺記》周群用書刀投向白猿化老翁，教占卜算術。《後漢書》誰得土地、誰失領土、出師利否？多實現。
text: "Supplementary Notes" Zhou Qun uses a book knife to throw at the white ape-shaped old man, teaching divination and arithmetic. In the Book of the Later Han Dynasty, who gets the land, who loses the territory, and does it benefit from the teacher? Realize more.
